name: WN_Rhythm Phage
description:
Brain training game: Put the capsule through, but don't put the round one through.

Rhythm game: When the notes come, break the notes with Phage's legs.

The feet are compatible with keyboards and gamepads.

Operation Description [Keyboard(Not checked)]

When the KEYBOARD checkbox in the start scene is turned off

[Keyboard(checked)]

Turn on the KEYBOARD checkbox in the start scene.

[Gamepad]
